argument.name: L
argument.description: Return type, .T. if the current user is in at least one of the specified roles; otherwise .F.

argument.name: RoleNames as C
argument.description: The name of the roles. The role names are separated by a comma or a space ("," or " ").

page.description: Checks to see if the current user is in at least one of supplied roles.
page.discussion: Context.Security.IsCurrentUserInRole() checks to see if the current user is in at least one of supplied roles. Check Context.Security.CallResult.Success before using the return value.
